sentence.Network_en: Unchivalrously, the husbands who had to provide such innocent indulgences eventually began to count the costs.
sentence.Network_cn: 很没男士风度的是, 本该体贴迁就妻子的丈夫最后开始计算损失.

list.abs: uncheck 未交运, unchivalrous 无侠义心肠的, unchecked 未经检验的
How unchivalrous of you !, 你怎么这样没风度!

means.word_mean: 1. in an unchivalrous and ungallant manner;

sentences.sentence: "unchivalrously, the husbands who had to provide such innocent indulgences eventually began to count the costs"
